content.arrabic: نَوَيْتُ صَوْمَ يَوْمَ اْلاِثْنَيْنِ سُنَّةً ِللهِ تَعَالَى
content.latin: Nawaitu sauma yaumal itsnaini sunnatan lillâhi ta‘âlâ.

translation.id: Saya niat puasa hari Senin, sunnah karena Allah ta’âlâ.
translation.en: I intend to fast on Monday, as a sunnah practice for the sake of Allah Ta‘âlâ.
